basic_infos.about_me: I'm a developer who is trying himself in many different roles. I like to be a part of new projects, come up with new ideas and accomplish them. I like to work in a cheerful environment, however, it is important for me to have space where I can focus on my tasks. If you see a camera in my hand, don’t panic it is my guilty pleasure. It helps me to be more creative in life.

experiences.description: Development, maintenance and customization of our navigation software for our customers (Java, C++ , X-Script). | I have become one of the key members of our SDK and API development team. I have prepared more than 90% of the android sdk and the sample app which belongs to it. As an extension of our documentation this app is a guide on how to use our SDK.

This is one of the best period of my carrier. I was a member of an innovation team that worked on a new era of cars infotainment system. We prepared the UX/UI design front-end, back-end and embedded development. Unfortunately, the year 2020 wasn’t gentle for us and this project was cancelled.

I have gained experience in development of iGO front-end. How to use our custom UIML markup language and how to give soul to the layout with Lua script. I worked on many interesting projects of our customers like SAIC Motors, Pioneer or Ferrari.
Windows applicitaion developement (in Delphi) for security cameras, traffic and parking observation system. With this application the enduser can handle and supervise camera images and nvr system.

interests.title: In my free time, I like:

playing board games with my friends
